text: @Mike_Pence @realDonaldTrump Correction: Your administration cut taxes to billionaires & corporations, you're still trying to remove the ACA in the middle of a pandemic, WE are paying for the Chinese tariffs & millions of jobs HAVE BEEN LOST because of your ineptitude in handling the #coronavirus. #TrumpLies

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
